chapter.title: Attach your network to an existing server
chapter.para: The following flow chart shows the steps for attaching a network to an existing server by using the Nova-network API. These steps are detailed in this guide. Steps to attach a network to an existing server
The sections are also organized by example type. To simplify your path through this chapter, decide whether you prefer nova-client examples or cURL examples.
If you haven't already installed the virtual interface extension, do that first.

sidebar.para: If you need to install the virtual interface extension: Go to “Install the &virt_ext;”

If you've installed the virtual interface extension: Choose one of the following methods:
“Use nova-network API and nova client”
“Use nova-network API and cURL”
